00198 #define RKH_CREATE_HSM( sm_t, name, id, ppty, is, ia, hd )              \
00199                                                                         \
00200     static rkhrom ROMRKH_T rs_##name = { id,ppty,#name,is,ia };         \
00201                 static sm_t s_##name = { &rs_##name,is,hd };            \
00202                 RKH_T * const name = ( RKH_T* )&s_##name
00203

00224 #define RKH_CREATE_COMP_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,defchild,history )  \
00225                                                                         \
00226                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00227                                                                         \
00228                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00229                                 {                                       \
00230                                     mkbase(RKH_COMPOSITE,id,name),      \
00231                                     mkcomp(en,ex,parent,name,           \
00232                                                 defchild,history)       \
00233                                 }
00234

00262                                                                         \

00264                                                                         \
00265                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \

00268                                     mkbasic(en,ex,parent,name,prepro)   \

00295                                                                         \
00296                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00297                                                                         \
00298                                 rkhrom RKHSCOND_T name =                \

00301                                     name##_trtbl                        \

00349 #define RKH_CREATE_DEEP_HISTORY_STATE( name,id,parent )                 \
00350                                                                         \
00351                                 static rkhrom RKHSREG_T *ram##name;     \
00352                                                                         \
00353                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00354                                 {                                       \
00355                                     mkbase(RKH_DHISTORY,id,name),       \
00356                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
00357                                 }
